data.title: Eminem's Family Guide in Photos: Meet His Kids, Ex-Wife and Mom
data.meta_description: Eminem shares daughter Hailie with ex-wife Kimberly Scott and adopted Alaina and Stevie â€” see photos of his family
data.text:
In addition to being one of the most celebrated hip-hop artists of all time, Eminem is a father to three children.

During an October 2020 appearance on the â€œHotboxin With Mike Tysonâ€ podcast, the â€œLose Yourselfâ€ rapper shared insight into his parenting journey: â€œWhen I think about my accomplishments, thatâ€™s probably the thing that Iâ€™m the most proud of â€¦ being able to raise kids.â€

The Grammy winner welcomed daughter Hailie Jade in December 1995 with ex-wife Kim Scott. The former spouses tied the knot in 1999 and split in 2001 before exchanging vows for a second time in 2006. They called it quits again later that same year.

Scott opened up about her tumultuous relationship with Eminem during a 2007 appearance on 20/20. â€œI was excited, I was happy, but at the same time I thought he was rushing things,â€ she recalled of her feelings when the â€œSupermanâ€ musician proposed to her for the second time.

The Michigan native continued: â€œIn our relationship, thereâ€™s a pattern. Like, weâ€™ll have two good years and then it will go bad for some reason. Itâ€™s like a two-year max with us and we hadnâ€™t reached the two years yet. I just didnâ€™t want to rush into anything before the two years.â€

Although things didnâ€™t work out between the exes, the D12 alum said that their daughter Hailie has â€œmade [him] proudâ€ during his 2020 sit-down with Mike Tyson. Eminem also adopted Stevie â€” whom his ex-wife welcomed in 2002 with then-boyfriend Eric Hartter â€”and Alaina, born in 1993 to Kimâ€™s sister, Dawn Scott.

â€œI have full custody of my niece,â€ the 8 Mile star said of Alaina â€” whom he has referred to as â€œLaineyâ€ in his music â€” during a 2004 interview with Rolling Stone. â€œMy niece has been a part of my life ever since she was born. Me and Kim pretty much had her, sheâ€™d live with us wherever we was at.â€

Alaina wed longtime boyfriend Matt Moeller in June 2023 with her sister Hailie at her side as a bridesmaid. â€œJune 9, 2023 simply one of the best days of my lifeğŸ¤ in this lifetime and in the next, my soul will always find yours,â€ she captioned a series of Instagram photos from the special day.

The Detroit residentâ€™s mom, Dawn, died at age 41 in 2016 after struggling with drug addiction. Her sister, Kim, penned a heartfelt message for the Lee Ellena Funeral Homeâ€™s website at the time.

â€œDawn was my sweet, beautiful sister who lost her way. I kept a light lit for her hoping sheâ€™d find her way back to me. I miss her and love her more than anything I could ever say. I wish she was here so I could hug her and tell her I love her,â€ the message read.
